News.Title: Fischer Medical Ventures Promoter Pledges Shares
News.Summary: Promoter Shankar Varadharajan pledged 30,00,000 equity shares (4.63% stake) to HDFC Bank as collateral for ₹40 crores loan for working capital needs of wholly owned subsidiary.

News.Title: Fischer Medical Q3FY26 Results & Key Updates
News.Summary: Fischer Medical Ventures reported Q3FY26 results with consolidated revenue of ₹10,109.52 lakhs and net profit of ₹1,923.48 lakhs. Company announced key management changes and subsidiary restructuring.

News.Title: Fischer Medical Ventures Approves Internal Reorganisation
News.Summary: Fischer Medical Ventures' Executive Business Committee approved transfer of foreign subsidiary shares to wholly owned subsidiary for operational efficiency without impacting ultimate ownership or control.

News.Title: Fischer Medical Ventures Updates Board Committee Structure
News.Summary: Fischer Medical Ventures Limited disclosed updated composition of key board committees including Audit, Nomination & Remuneration, and Risk Management committees with detailed member appointments.

News.Title: Fischer Medical Ventures Reports Strong Q2 Growth with Net Profit Surge to 139M Rupees
News.Summary: Fischer Medical Ventures reported consolidated net profit of 139 million rupees in Q2, compared to 3 million rupees in the same period last year. The company's revenue increased to 863 million rupees from 397 million rupees year-over-year.

News.Title: Fischer Medical Ventures' Nanomedic Secures UK NHS Approval and CDSCO License for SpinCare Device
News.Summary: Fischer Medical Ventures announced that its subsidiary Nanomedic has successfully overcome a UK NHS challenge and obtained a license from CDSCO for its SpinCare device. The company has introduced plans for the India market and is targeting a US FDA filing for the medical device.
